name: Pachink-Off!
description:
Do you love the head to head competitive rush of a fighting game? Do you love the thrill of gambling? Get ready to enter the exciting world of Pachink-Off!

Pachink-Off is a mobile slots game, but no money is involved; the only goal is to get more tokens than your opponent!

In this web demo, get a taste of the head-to-head action with unique and wacky characters as you engage in a fast paced gambling duel! Players will experience unorthodox, yet exciting competitive multiplayer slot-machine game-play that is sure to give them something to remember.

NOTE: This web demo will currently only work on devices with mouse input; it will have some strange behavior, particularly for darts, for touch input. If you want to play on mobile, please download the android build!
